title: Neshuma
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Western, Beer/Wine
description: Opened Aug 2014, this vegetarian restaurant offers a varied menu, from pizza and pasta to wraps and sandwiches, from noodles and veggie sushi with tofu to vegan pastries. Could substitute cashew cheese in a vegetarian dish that uses dairy cheese.
streetAddress: Avenida Segunda, Centro Comercial San Pedro
